participant_1.background:
I've had to protect myself from bullies, but I'm not a fighter by nature.
I got really sick and had to spend a week in the hospital.
i work too much.
i m not a nice person.
I sometimes lose track of my surroundings when I'm riding my horse, which can be dangerous.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy a cold glass of sweet tea to cool down on a hot summer day.
my mother is in the hospital.
i love pizza.
to stay in shape , i chase cheetahs at the zoo.
i wear a uniform to work.

content.text: Hello, how is your day going?
Good, just got back from visiting my mom in the hospital, she is doing much better.
Glad to hear that. I recently had to spend a week in the hospital myself. What was the reason for your visit?
She had a kidney stone, but surgery went well and she is expected to be released soon. What happened to you?
I got really sick and had to have my appendix removed. It was not fun at all.
Oh wow, that sounds horrible. I am sorry to hear that. But I am glad you are okay now.
Thank you, I am doing much better now. What did you do for fun this weekend?
Mostly just relaxed and hung out with my family. I also got a chance to go to the zoo and see the cheetahs.
That sounds like fun. I love pizza, that must have been a great lunch.
It was, I love pizza. What is your favorite thing to do for fun?
I enjoy riding horses, but I sometimes get lost in the woods and that can be dangerous.
That sounds like fun, but also dangerous. I am a bit of a klutz so I would probably fall off the horse.
It is actually not as dangerous as it sounds, but I guess I am used to it. I have been riding horses since I was a little kid.
That is cool, I have always wanted to learn how to ride horses.
It is really easy, you just have to hold on tight and let the horse do the work.
Maybe I will take a lesson sometime
